    <metadata>

        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="es">Juego de cálculo de descuentos y recargos</string>
            <string language="en">A game about the calculation of discounts and supplements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel über die Berechnung von Diskonten und 
von Ergänzungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu au sujet du calcul des escomptes et des 
suppléments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo sobre o cálculo dos discontos e dos 
suplementos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco circa il calcolo degli sconti e dei 
supplementi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι για τον υπολογισμό των εκπτώσεων και των 
συμπληρωμάτων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite comprobar la solución de problemas de descuento y recargo con porcentajes</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to check the solution to problems on percentages, with discounts and supplements</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">porcentaje</string>
            <string language="en">percentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">descuento</string>
            <string language="en">discount</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cálculo</string>
            <string language="en">calculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recargo</string>
            <string language="en">supplement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">número</string>
            <string language="en">number</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, 
die Lösung zu den Problemen auf Prozentsätzen, mit Diskonten und 
Ergänzungen zu überprüfen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui permet à l'utilisateur 
de contrôler la solution aux problèmes sur des pourcentages, avec 
des escomptes et des suppléments</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que permite que o usuário 
verifique a solução aos problemas em porcentagens, com os discontos 
e os suplementos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente 
controlli la soluzione ai problemi sulle percentuali, con gli sconti 
ed i supplementi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
ελέγξει τη λύση στα προβλήματα στα ποσοστά, με τις εκπτώσεις και 
τα συμπληρώματα</string>
          </description>
